channel.title: Reaper left with court wizard and game wass auto draw
channel.description: #### What happened? I was playing the reaper. Me and the court wizard were the only ones who left alive in the game. The game ended as draw #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Any natural killer should win at 1 vs 1 unless its the prince or the king.

item.title: Reaper left with court wizard and game wass auto draw
item.dc:creator: Loudo
item.description:
Navi:

EDIT: Wait, even then, the killer would become immune eventually. Yeah, this is weird.

The old Tornado wasn’t affected by occupy immunity, so yeah it’s definitely a leftover from before the latest patch.

Read full topic
item.source: Reaper left with court wizard and game wass auto draw

item.title: Reaper left with court wizard and game wass auto draw
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
I guess it’s a leftover end-game rule from the old court wizard with infinite swaps, since it’d be impossible to kill old CW in that situation

EDIT: Wait, even then, the killer would become immune eventually. Yeah, this is weird.

Read full topic
item.source: Reaper left with court wizard and game wass auto draw

item.description:

item.source: Reaper left with court wizard and game wass auto draw

item.title: Reaper left with court wizard and game wass auto draw
item.dc:creator: methomps
item.description:
Was in a game today with the same scenario except poss v. CW. I just think they haven’t updated auto end scenarios to account for changes to CW.

I also had a scenario where I was MM against a possessor, and the game ended with possessor win. I think it should have ended as a draw given MM is night immune.

Read full topic
item.source: Reaper left with court wizard and game wass auto draw

item.title: Reaper left with court wizard and game wass auto draw
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
What happened?

I was playing the reaper.
Me and the court wizard were the only ones who left alive in the game. The game ended as draw

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Any natural killer should win at 1 vs 1 unless its the prince or the king.

Read full topic
item.source: Reaper left with court wizard and game wass auto draw
